attributes.action: Allow weddings up to go ahead with up to 100 guests
attributes.additional_details: Protests are allowed but we can’t get married. It needs to change NOW! My partners mother has stage 4 terminal cancer and we want her part of our special day! Something has to be done now! Please help and sign xx
attributes.background: As me and my partner have had to cancel our wedding 3 times this year It’s now booked for September 19th.. hoping by then we can have more than 30 people to celebrate. So why we can’t have our nearest and dearest at our WEDDING yet all these big shops and every beer garden/pub is full to the brim!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339
